FuncDef: Enabling force-l2pt-boundary will force all SAPs managed by the specified m-vpls instance on the corresponding port to have l2pt-termination enabled. This command is applicable only to SAPs created under m-vpls regardless of the flavor of STP currently active. It is not applicable to spoke-SDPs.
CLIs: force-l2pt-boundary [ cdp ] [ dtp ] [ pagp ] [ stp ] [ udld ] [ vtp ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies all spanning tree protocols: stp, rstp, mstp, pvst (default).
